528.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 13, relative to curriculum.
528.description: As enacted, requires an LEA or public charter school to notify a student's parent or guardian prior to commencing instruction of a sexual orientation or gender identity curriculum; permits a parent or guardian to excuse the parent's or guardian's student from a sexual orientation or gender identity curriculum, and prohibits the LEA or charter school from penalizing an excused student. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 13.

2690.last_action: Failed for lack of second in: Health Subcommittee
2690.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, Chapter 8; Title 37 and Title 68, Chapter 3, relative to vital records.
2690.description: As introduced, allows amendments of birth certificates to reflect the individual's gender identity. - Amends TCA Title 29, Chapter 8; Title 37 and Title 68, Chapter 3.
